mapper.sql: KPI_ID,KPI_GROUP_ID, KPI_NAME, KPI_CODE, KPI_TYPE, KPI_DEFAULT_VALUE, KPI_DESC, FETCH_TYPE, KPI_VALUE_SOURCE, KPI_VALUE_SOURCE_NAME,KPI_VALUE_SOURCE_CODE, DB_ID, DB_ALIAS, DB_TYPE, TABLE_ID, TABLE_CODE, FETCH_SQL, API_ID, API_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, PARTNER_CODE, PARTNER_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SYSTEM_CODE, SYSTEM_NAME, CREATE_USER_JOB_NUMBER, UPDATE_USER_JOB_NUMBER
mapper.select: SELECT TYPE_ID "key", TYPE_VALUE "text" FROM CRE_KPI_TYPE ORDER BY TYPE_ID

SELECT b.RULE_SET_NAME as RULE_SET_NAME, a.VERSION as VERSION, f.RULE_SET_GROUP_NAME as RULE_SET_GROUP_NAME, b.RULE_SET_HEADER_DESC as RULE_SET_HEADER_DESC FROM CRE_PUB_RULE_SET a left join CRE_KPI_RULE_SET k ON a.RULE_SET_ID = k.RULE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN CRE_PUB_RULE_SET_HEADER b ON b.RULE_SET_HEADER_ID = a.RULE_SET_HEADER_ID LEFT JOIN CRE_PUB_RULE_SET_GROUP f ON f.RULE_SET_GROUP_ID = b.RULE_SET_GROUP_ID WHERE k.KPI_ID = #{kpiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, KPI_ID, COLUMN_ID,COLUMN_CODE, COLUMN_NAME, VARIABLE_ID, VARIABLE_CODE, VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_TYPE_ID, FETCH_TYPE FROM CRE_KPI_FETCH_LIMITERS WHERE KPI_ID = #{kpiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CRE_KPI_DEFINITION
KPI_NAME = #{kpiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

KPI_TYPE = #{kpiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KPI_DEFAULT_VALUE = #{kpiDefaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KPI_DESC = #{kpiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KPI_GROUP_ID = #{kpiGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

KPI_VALUE_SOURCE = #{kpiValueSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KPI_VALUE_SOURCE_NAME = #{kpiValueSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KPI_VALUE_SOURCE_CODE = #{kpiValueSourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PARTNER_CODE = #{partnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_CODE = #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_NAME = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER_JOB_NUMBER= #{platformUpdateUserJobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_ID = #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_ALIAS = #{dbAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_TYPE = #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_CODE = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FETCH_SQL = #{fetchSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
API_ID = #{apiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, API_NAME = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where KPI_ID = #{kpiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where KPI_ID = #{kpiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into CRE_KPI_FETCH_LIMITERS ( ID, KPI_ID, COLUMN_ID, COLUMN_CODE, COLUMN_NAME, VARIABLE_ID, VARIABLE_CODE,VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_TYPE_ID, FETCH_TYPE ) select A.* from (
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kpiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.variableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.variableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.variableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.variableTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fetchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual ) A
